page.title: 06LIVING IN DYCE.
page.content: Recently the private part of Dyce has deteriorated.This happened because of vandalism. This may be because both parents usually work & do not care what thier children do. House prices have risen in Dyce. e.g. in 1978_79 a house would have cost Â£35,000.Now this costs Â£78,000.This has happened because Dyce Shopping Centre,the airport, and the station have opened. Some houses are very old.One person has to walk down 32 stairs to his toi- let.Another street is 150 years old. These houses are crumbling down are about to be demolished.The main street of Dyce looks very old fashioned.Some of the houses were built in the 19th century. One house has a secret passage leading from one bedroom to another from a cupboard.It was once a stable.
